name: Football World Master
description:
******************
FREE FULL GAME
NO ADS
******************

BECOME A SOCCER CLUB OWNER!

Buy clubs around the world.
Invest your money in transfers, staff, training facilities and stadiums to improve the team.
Take your clubs to the top of world soccer or sell them and pocket the cash.
Manage several clubs at the same time to maximize your earnings.

It's a long way to go, but your goal is within your reach: win the best trophies in world football and become THE SOCCER WORLD MASTER!

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

YOU ARE THE BOSS

Your role is not to coach the team. Your role is to make the decisions:
- Change the coach or give him the means to progress.
- Accept or reject transfers and contract renewals.
- Choose your sporting director and your marketing director.
- Listen to the advice of your staff and accept or reject their requests.
- Invest your money in improving the training centre.
- Set your stadium ticket prices and build a bigger stadium.

Sometimes you have to choose between financial profitability and the sporting future of your clubs. Between your own interests and those of the fans. Between your wealth and your popularity. You will need talent, business acumen and good communication skills to become rich and popular.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

A COMPLETE SIMULATION

115 competitions in 37 countries.
1200 clubs.
National and international competitions in 5 continents.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

BUY AT THE RIGHT TIME, SELL AT THE RIGHT PRICE

Winning trophies will earn you money, but nothing is more profitable than selling a club after you have improved it.

- - - - - - - - - - - - -

THE POPULARITY OF YOUR CLUBS WILL DEFINE YOUR POPULARITY

The fervour of the fans is a central element of the game. If you make your decisions only to improve the profitability of your clubs, your popularity will drop and your stadiums will empty. But give a club the means to win trophies and you will become the idol of the city.
